==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Single Shot
|desc_1 = Fires a projectile at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Melee Attack
|desc_2      = Performs a melee attack at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = Stressed State
|desc_3 = Periodically enters a stressed state, during which it will gain a {{Dendro}} [[Shield/Enemy|shield]] and fire waves of Lushmissiles at the player, with each Lushmissile dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}}. 

The shield is weakest to {{Electro}}. A single [[Arkhe]] attack, {{Pneuma}} or {{Ousia}}, will also instantly destroy the shield. Once the shield is broken, the Breacher Primus will become paralyzed for a long period of time.

Once paralyzed, the exposed core counts as a [[Weak Point]].
{{Elemental Shield Data|Dendro|2}}
|file_3_2 = Overgrown Breacher Primus Stressed State 2
}}
